Each player mills four cards.
Coalesce {5}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {5}{U}{U}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
When A Vision Too Vast enters, you may cast target noncreature, nonland card with mana value 4 or less from a graveyard without paying its mana cost.
